articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Yakima County Jail’s basement remains closed due to flooding
articles.description: YAKIMA, Wash. (AP) — The basement of the Yakima County jail remains shut down due to flooding. But the Yakima Herald-Republic reports that it’s expected to be operational by Tuesday. Jeremy Welch, Yakima County Department of Corrections chief, said crews are …

articles.author: Phil Ferolito
articles.title: Yakima County sheriff admits to missteps that freed felon who killed student in 2016
articles.description: Yakima sheriff and jail acknowledge slips in the release from jail of a man who went on to kill a 20-year-old Tieton missionary student in 2016. Public records show lapses.
